Divert1: ^MEI: Do you need to know anything else?

c-0: ^ MEI: The entrance to their lab is very close to ours. Just next to the little library in the hall. They usually keep the nitrogen in the back room.

c-2: ^ ME: Nope, I'll be on my way.
